title.en: Return upstream catchment stream segments as GeoJSON

description.en: Return the stream segments of the upstream catchments of the subcatchment (into which the given point falls) as a GeoJSON Feature (where the geometry is a LineString). The subcatchment itself not included.

add_upstream_ids.title: Add upstream ids?
add_upstream_ids.description: Switch whether to add the upstream ids to the GeoJSON Feature's properties. Please write "true" or "false".

comment.title: Comment
comment.description: Arbitrary string that will not be processed but returned, for user"s convenience.

geometry_only.title: Get only GeoJSON GeometryCollection?
geometry_only.description: Switch whether to return only a GeoJSON GeometryCollection (in this case, LineStrings), instead of a GeoJSON FeatureCollection containing additional properties. Please write "true" or "false".

subcatchment.title: Subcatchment Id
subcatchment.description: Id of the subcatchment whose upstream catchment was computed. Example: 553495421.

upstream_catchment_ids.title: Upstream Catchment Ids
upstream_catchment_ids.description: List of subcatchment ids of the subcatchments included in the upstream catchment.
